title: Petition for an opt out option for pool party ziggs
body:
I like everyone else was under the assumption that we would be getting the server skin for free as every other region has and that the pool party ziggs skin was a gift to us because of the delays.

There was never any mention that this skin was the initial 'payment' and that if we wanted the server skin we would have to buy it at a later date. I therefore would like to petition to remove the Pool party Ziggs skin from my account and to be gifted the new server skin.

None of us asked for this and riot has never mentioned that this is how the situation would be played out. I never wanted the ziggs skin in the first place, I only wanted what all the other serves had received.
